thread.title: Mövenpick Amsterdam and CIMGlobal become partners
thread.title_full: Mövenpick Amsterdam and CIMGlobal become partners

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Mövenpick Amsterdam and CIMGlobal become partners
text:
Mövenpick Amsterdam and CIMGlobal become partners Mövenpick Amsterdam and CIMGlobal become partners Details Category: Hotel Created   16:30 Mövenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre has announced their recent partnership agreement with CIMGlobal Europe, highlighting the vibrant city of Amsterdam. Mövenpick offers the ideal location and experience in hospitality for conferences in Amsterdam, while CIMGlobal can manage and organize tailor made conferences and corporate events. Together, they aim to assist corporate & association clients nationally as a one stop shop. 
CIMGlobal provides consultancy and management services for conferences, associations, corporate meetings and exhibitions globally. Depending on the clients needs, CIMGlobal can act as a full service provider but also deliver parts of clients’ projects. CIMGlobal is a professional organizer of business incentives, product launches, company parties and supplementary social services such as boat and museum tours, as well as managing registration and sponsorship management. With over 10 years of experience, CIMGlobal can personalize any event for an affordable rate. Mövenpick clients can now profit from the opportunity to experience a truly customized meeting at the Mövenpick Hotel in Amsterdam, organized and assisted by CIMGlobal Europe. Mövenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre offers 12 conference rooms in the hotel and 10 new meeting rooms in their Meeting Center “Next Door”. The hotel is part of ijVENUES, ideal for big events & conferences up to 1900 delegates. The location, at 5 minutes from the Central Train Station, makes this a popular venue. 408 hotel rooms, great accessibility via all transport options and daylight in the meeting rooms are some of the characteristics of Mövenpick and ijVENUES. Because of this combination, CIMGlobal has picked Mövenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre as their preferred partner in Amsterdam for their clients. Related articles
